quest.name: Way of the Miner
journal: Linette wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Miners' Guild.
You have been referred to Adalberta, the master of the Miners' Guild. Meet her at the bar.

Adalberta warmly welcomes you to the guild, and presents you with your very own─very old─pickaxe. Take up the tool of your new trade, and speak with the guildmaster again to be issued your first task.
objectives: Speak with Adalberta, the master of the Miners' Guild.

dialogue.name: LINETTE
dialogue.text: So, are you ready to join the Miners' Guild?

dialogue.name: LINETTE
dialogue.text: Oh. Are you quite certain? I felt sure that you were destined to make the next big find... I pictured you grinning next to a lump of gold the size of your head.

dialogue.name: LINETTE
dialogue.text: 'Tis truly a shame, but if you still have your doubts, there is no help for it. Should you be struck by a sudden desire to amass untold wealth, I shall be here to help.

dialogue.name: LINETTE
dialogue.text: Music to my ears! Aye, the kind made when one's pickaxe strikes gold!

dialogue.name: LINETTE
dialogue.text: You must introduce yourself to Guildmaster Adalberta right away.

dialogue.name: LINETTE
dialogue.text: Her approval is required if you are to be formally admitted to our ranks.

dialogue.name: LINETTE
dialogue.text: In case you're unaware, Adalberta is perhaps the most accomplished of those miners who still swing a pickaxe.

dialogue.name: LINETTE
dialogue.text:
Her understanding of our trade is unsurpassed, and her flair for prospecting uncanny. Her brain, in short, is a veritable gold mine of knowledge─much of it concerning the mining of gold.
...Ha ha! Jesting apart, you stand to learn a great deal from her.

dialogue.name: LINETTE
dialogue.text: When you are ready, pray present yourself to Adalberta. You will find her down the steps yonder, over by the bar.

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: Well met, adventurer. Adalberta's my name, and I'm the master of this guild.

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: I take it you wish to become a miner. Well, our doors are open to all who aren't afraid to work hard and get dirty.

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: Thanks to recent advances in refining techniques, it's now possible to smelt even low-purity ores. I mention this because it's allowed us to reopen a number of mines which were long thought exhausted, prompting trade to flourish.

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: Truth be told, with business as it is at the moment, we can't take on enough new miners. And few folk make better miners than adventurers, you being a hardy lot.

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: What's more, you're well traveled, which serves to expand the guild's sphere of activity. Oh, but I'm not suggesting you join solely for our benefit.

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: For your part, you'll acquire skills that will prove to your profit─a mutually beneficial arrangement, I trust you'll agree. So what say you? You will join us, yes?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Ready to work hard and get dirty?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: This is...unexpected. You have so much to gain and nothing to lose. Won't you reconsider?

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: Then I bid you welcome to the Miners' Guild! May your toils never go unrewarded!

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: Now then, here's a pickaxe to get you started. It's not the newest, but it should serve a novice well enough.

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: Go on and take it up─see how it feels in your hands.

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: Speak to me again when you're ready, and I'll assign you a little task to help you get into the swing of things.

obj.n: So You Want to Be a Miner
